Challenge.Name: Lv 1 RUN
Challenge.How_to_play: No need to up level play with LV1 until end
Challenge.Detail: Play with any class with based level do not level up allow item plus stats allow

Challenge.Name: Default Loadout
Challenge.How_to_play: End game with based loadout of class
Challenge.Detail: End game with based loadout of class don't change anything in loadout. U still can up stats enchant

Challenge.Name: Mod Convergence Run
Challenge.How_to_play: Like a normal game but it MOD
Challenge.DetailMod: The Convergence mod is an exhaustive overhaul of Elden Ring with dozens of new weapons, hundreds of new spells, extensively revamped areas and maps, new enemies, bosses and much more.

Challenge.Name: GRACEBORNE - Bloodborne Inspired Overhaul Run
Challenge.How_to_play: Like a normal game but it MOD
Challenge.Detail: Eldenring mod from CorvianNoctis New Weapon New moveset
Challenge.DetailMod: Graceborne is a mod overhaul still in its infancy. Heavily inspired by Bloodborne, its main goalis to turn Elden Ring's base game into a more grim and sinister experience through multiple means
